text: By the Fireplace () is a 1917 Russian silent drama movie directed by Pyotr Chardynin.Очередь за киноиллюзиямиУ камина (1916) It stars Vera Kholodnaya, Vladimir Maksimo, and Vitold Polonsky. == Actors == * Vera Kholodnaya * Vladimir Maksimov as Peshchersky * Vitold Polonsky as Lanin == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:Russian silent movies Category:1917 drama movies Category:Movies directed by Pyotr Chardynin
title: By the Fireplace
